name: Radancy
description: We are the leading cloud-based talent acquisition software provider intelligently solving the most critical challenges for enterprises globally and delivering cost-efficient outcomes that strengthen their organizations. The Radancy Talent Acquisition Cloud, powered by rich data and deep industry insights, optimizes the entire candidate journey, enabling enterprises to hire the most qualified talent faster, while reducing costs and driving higher ROI, recruiter efficiency and an improved candidate experience.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Optimize your talent acquisition outcomes and improve your ROI
ShortDescription: AI-powered platform designed to maximize your ROI

Highlights.name: Attract & Source
Highlights.description: Drive job visibility to qualified talent through a multi-faceted, automation-driven approach.

Highlights.name: Engage & Inform
Highlights.description: Educate candidates on open roles and fit with data-driven personalized experiences.

Highlights.name: Capture & Convert
Highlights.description: Build a qualified talent pipeline with data collection across the entire candidate journey.

enhanced_description: Radancy is a leading cloud-based talent acquisition software provider designed for enterprises globally. Its AI-powered platform, fueled by rich data and deep industry insights, optimizes the entire candidate journey. The solution enables organizations to hire qualified talent faster, reduce costs, drive higher ROI, improve recruiter efficiency, and enhance the candidate experience. Key capabilities include end-to-end engagement, data-driven intelligence, and expertise in innovation, specifically focusing on attracting and sourcing talent through automation, engaging and informing candidates with personalized experiences, and capturing and converting them to build qualified talent pipelines. It also supports boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Attracting and sourcing talent through automation
Engaging and informing candidates with personalized experiences
Building and managing qualified talent pipelines
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Focus on ROI and cost reduction
roi_benefits: Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
